title: Disable Collections API during rolling upgrade
description:
As per Mark,

"bq.  want to upgrade note a recommendation to not run collections api commands while doing the rolling upgrade

The more I think about this, the more this makes sense in general, for any rolling upgrades. We should remove this java serialization, but I think creating or modifying a collection across versions is probably never a wonderful idea. We might want to add an easy way to enable / disable such API's even."
